languages.text: "Не судите меня строго, я лишь пытаюсь влиться в атмосферу праздника, как могу. Можем и сменить тему. Хотелось бы отметить удивительный способ продлевать молодость путем пересадки лиц. Есть ли на Тассере еще уникальные знания и предметы, привезенные с вашего мира — как там его, кстати?"

traits.locale_text: "Видимо, полет на космическом корабле — слишком незначительное событие для феодала, чтобы его помнить".

languages.text: "Do not judge me harshly. I am just trying to get into the festive mood as best I can. We can certainly change the subject. I would like to note that I find your youth-extending face transplant procedure amazing. Does Thassera possess any other unique knowledge or items brought over from your homeworld? What is that world called, by the way?"
languages.original_text: "Не судите меня строго, я лишь пытаюсь влиться в атмосферу праздника, как могу. Можем и сменить тему. What is that world called, by the way?"

languages.text: “不要误会我的意思，我只是想努力融入庆典氛围而已。不如我们换个话题聊聊吧，我想说，这种可以延年益寿的面部移植手术真的很了不起。另外，塔瑟拉还有别的什么独一无二的东西吗，比如从你的家园世界带来的那些东西？顺便问一句，那个世界是叫什么来着？”
languages.original_text: "Do not judge me harshly. I am just trying to get into the festive mood as best I can. We can certainly change the subject. I would like to note that I find your youth-extending face transplant procedure amazing. Does Thassera possess any other unique knowledge or items brought over from your homeworld? What is that world called, by the way?"

traits.locale_text: “不要误会我的意思，我只是想努力融入庆典氛围而已。不如我们换个话题聊聊吧，我想说，这种可以延年益寿的面部移植手术真的很了不起。另外，塔瑟拉还有别的什么独一无二的东西吗，比如从你的家园世界带来的那些东西？顺便问一句，那个世界是叫什么来着？”

languages.text: «No me juzgue con demasiada severidad. Simplemente hago lo posible por adoptar un espíritu festivo. Por supuesto que podemos cambiar de tema. Me gustaría señalar que encuentro fascinante ese procedimiento de trasplante facial para prolongar la juventud. ¿Posee Thassera alguna otra práctica o artefacto traídos de su mundo natal? ¿Qué mundo es ese, por cierto?».
languages.original_text: "Do not judge me harshly. I am just trying to get into the festive mood as best I can. We can certainly change the subject. I would like to note that I find your youth-extending face transplant procedure amazing. Does Thassera possess any other unique knowledge or items brought over from your homeworld? What is that world called, by the way?"

traits.locale_text: «No me juzgue con demasiada severidad. Simplemente hago lo posible por adoptar un espíritu festivo. Por supuesto que podemos cambiar de tema. Me gustaría señalar que encuentro fascinante ese procedimiento de trasplante facial para prolongar la juventud. ¿Posee Thassera alguna otra práctica o artefacto traídos de su mundo natal? ¿Qué mundo es ese, por cierto?».

languages.text: "Lütfen bu kadar üstüme gelmeyin. Elimden geldiğince kutlama havasına girmeye çalışıyorum. Elbette konuyu değiştirebiliriz. Gençliği uzatan yüz nakli prosedürünüzü çok iyi bulduğumu belirtmek isterim. Thassera, yurdunuzdan getirdiğiniz başka benzer bilgilere veya eşyalara sahip mi? Bu arada dünyanızın adı neydi?"
languages.original_text: "Do not judge me harshly. I am just trying to get into the festive mood as best I can. We can certainly change the subject. I would like to note that I find your youth-extending face transplant procedure amazing. Does Thassera possess any other unique knowledge or items brought over from your homeworld? What is that world called, by the way?"

traits.locale_text: "Lütfen bu kadar üstüme gelmeyin. Elimden geldiğince kutlama havasına girmeye çalışıyorum. Elbette konuyu değiştirebiliriz. Gençliği uzatan yüz nakli prosedürünüzü çok iyi bulduğumu belirtmek isterim. Thassera, yurdunuzdan getirdiğiniz başka benzer bilgilere veya eşyalara sahip mi? Bu arada dünyanızın adı neydi?"

languages.text: 「俺を目障りだと思わないでくれ。できる限り宴会の雰囲気に馴染もうとしてるだけだ。もちろん話題を変えても構わない。お前の若さを保つ顔面移植の手術は素晴らしいと感じている。タッセーラには他に、お前の母星から持ち込まれた独特な知識や品物はあるか？ところで、その惑星の名前は？」
languages.original_text: "Do not judge me harshly. I am just trying to get into the festive mood as best I can. We can certainly change the subject. I would like to note that I find your youth-extending face transplant procedure amazing. Does Thassera possess any other unique knowledge or items brought over from your homeworld? What is that world called, by the way?"

traits.locale_text: 「俺を目障りだと思わないでくれ。できる限り宴会の雰囲気に馴染もうとしてるだけだ。もちろん話題を変えても構わない。お前の若さを保つ顔面移植の手術は素晴らしいと感じている。タッセーラには他に、お前の母星から持ち込まれた独特な知識や品物はあるか？ところで、その惑星の名前は？」

languages.text: « Ne me jugez pas trop sévèrement. J'essaie tant bien que mal de me mettre dans l'ambiance de la fête. Nous pouvons bien évidemment changer de sujet. Je tiens à signaler que je trouve votre procédure de transplantation de visage prolongatrice de jeunesse véritablement incroyable. Thassera possède-t-elle d'autres savoirs ou curiosités uniques que vous auriez apportés de votre monde ? Comment s'appelle-t-il, déjà ? »
languages.original_text: "Do not judge me harshly. I am just trying to get into the festive mood as best I can. We can certainly change the subject. I would like to note that I find your youth-extending face transplant procedure amazing. Does Thassera possess any other unique knowledge or items brought over from your homeworld? What is that world called, by the way?"

traits.locale_text: « Ne me jugez pas trop sévèrement. J'essaie tant bien que mal de me mettre dans l'ambiance de la fête. Nous pouvons bien évidemment changer de sujet. Je tiens à signaler que je trouve votre procédure de transplantation de visage prolongatrice de jeunesse véritablement incroyable. Thassera possède-t-elle d'autres savoirs ou curiosités uniques que vous auriez apportés de votre monde ? Comment s'appelle-t-il, déjà ? »

languages.text: "Urteilt nicht zu streng über mich. Ich versuche nur, in Festlaune zu kommen. Natürlich können wir das Thema wechseln. Ich möchte anmerken, dass ich Eure Methode zur Gesichtstransplantation, um jung zu bleiben, erstaunlich finde. Verfügt Thassera noch über weiteres einzigartiges Wissen oder Objekte aus Eurer Heimatwelt? Und wie heißt diese Welt überhaupt?"
languages.original_text: "Do not judge me harshly. I am just trying to get into the festive mood as best I can. We can certainly change the subject. What is that world called, by the way?"
